name: @n8d/htwoo-pattern-export
description: CLI tool for exporting and comparing Pattern Lab patterns for the htwoo design system

scripts.test:
npm run test:build && npm run test:export && npm run test:verify && echo '
✅ All tests passed!'
scripts.test:build:
echo '
=== Building TypeScript ===' && npm run build && echo '✓ Build successful'
scripts.test:export:
echo '
=== Testing Export ===' && rm -rf ./test-result/htwoo-core && tsx src/cli.ts --source ../../htwoo-core/src/_patterns --output ./test-result/htwoo-core && echo '✓ Export successful'
scripts.test:verify:
echo '
=== Verifying Structure ===' && test -f ./test-result/htwoo-core/manifest.json && echo '✓ Manifest created' && test -d ./test-result/htwoo-core/_patterns && echo '✓ Patterns exported' && test -d ./test-result/htwoo-core/_data && echo '✓ Data exported' && test -d ./test-result/htwoo-core/images && echo '✓ Images exported' && ./verify-structure.sh

author: n8design
